entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
